reviewText: This DVD Set  was given as a gift. The recipient was thrilled with it and gave great reviews on the contents.

This is an excellent collection at an excellent price. Love the P&P, Emma, Vanity Fair, & Catherine the Great movies. I have not watched the others yet, but already greatly enjoy this purchase. These are cd's I will watch over & over again.
Worth it alone for Pride & Prejudice ...
Colin Firth and romance what's not to love. I am so excited to have this collection in my DVDs I just hope I don't wear them out.
A superb collection love it

I love BBC movies, I think I'm going to move to England. I love the way those people talk, I love the old fashion way of living. And of course I love Jennifer Ehle / Colin Firth!! I know I will enjoy this always!

I love British movies loved every movie in collection
,
Love it.
Bought for my husband who loves romance!
This collection was nice I would rackconme it to my friends and family
Arrived as promised
I've enjoyed this collection.  I love BBC entertainment.  This romance collection of the classics is an excellent package deal.
Well made movies. A good set.
wonderful, what a great escape into English romance.

The Romance Collection, is one that I will watch over and over again. I will watch any movie that
Colin Firth is in.
Lovely movies, well done,  Fun to have something to have available to enjoy that is not trashy. I like them.
Watched time and time again.  Colin Firth as Mr. Darcy can never be equaled.  This is one of my treasured collections.
This collection is a great way of getting lots of classical romance films all in one!  These are films you will watch over and over so definitely worth it!

I LOVE these movies!  Great when I am home alone and just want to curl up and lose myself!  (My husband has even watched one with me!)  I can watch these over & over.  Great actors and the production is good.
I purchased this collection for my wife for Mother's Day. So far we have watched 4 of the films. We rate one as very good, one as good and two as someone's poor idea of romance.
I have always wanted these movies and I was very happy to see a collection put together in one set.

Received this collection as a birthday gift. What a wonderful collection of movies! The star studded casts are amazing and each movie is a delight to watch! Perfect for those Regency/Jane Austen lovers. I treasure my copy!

I liked Pride and Prejudice best and Vanity Fair the least. I liked Jane Eyre very much. I hadn't seen these before and enjoyed most of the selection a great deal. I would buy it again and would recommend it to others with similar tastes.
Love all
Good classics.
Great buy!! Love me some Darcy!!
Excellent product!
Loved this
Returned item. Ordered it by mistake.
Received item expeditiously as described.  Have always love the BBC Romance classics.  Now I pretty much own the whole DVD collection.  Price was perfect for this edition.  Thank you.
Wonderful assortment. Romantic stories set in glorious locations. Sit back, relax and enjoy.
Cant go wrong w/English romance!!
